alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 11 at 9:01PM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills will be 25 below zero to 35 below zero at times. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains East, Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin, Lander Foothills and Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range. * WHEN...From 2 PM Friday to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Lander Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East
